title: the best social media is the same as it was 25 years ago: football team (and other hobby) forums, where most discussions are civil, not obligatorily political and where you won’t encounter fans of other teams / interests so you won’t get piled on over small things.

our latest: black borrowers are twice as likely to be rejected for a US mortgage as white borrowers - even after you account for income, location etc etc.  https://www.ft.com/content/217ccd86-7266-4c26-a5dd-18d6e726abcf

It’s A-level results day, so good luck to the education correspondents who have been asked to make something out of the UCAS numbers and tenuous claims by exam board chiefs about how they think [youth trend A] has been inspiring [exam choice B]
the way they fire off fireworks and silver foil around trophy winners makes me think the FA is worried about protecting the team from guided missiles
it’s a real shame that Trump didn’t fully embrace the Spirit of Chelsea by taking part in the pre-season warm-up trophy celebration in full Chelsea kit, including shin-pads.
